00068 /* ******************** manage regions ********************* */
00069 
00070 ARegion *node_has_buttons_region(ScrArea *sa)
00071 {
00072     ARegion *ar, *arnew;
00073 
00074     ar= BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_UI);
00075     if (ar) return ar;
00076     
00077     /* add subdiv level; after header */
00078     ar= BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_HEADER);
00079 
00080     /* is error! */
00081     if (ar==NULL) return NULL;
00082     
00083     arnew= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "buttons for node");
00084     
00085     BLI_insertlinkafter(&sa->regionbase, ar, arnew);
00086     arnew->regiontype= RGN_TYPE_UI;
00087     arnew->alignment= RGN_ALIGN_RIGHT;
00088     
00089     arnew->flag = RGN_FLAG_HIDDEN;
00090     
00091     return arnew;
00092 }

00096 static SpaceLink *node_new(const bContext *UNUSED(C))
00097 {
00098     ARegion *ar;
00099     SpaceNode *snode;
00100     
00101     snode= MEM_callocN(sizeof(SpaceNode), "initnode");
00102     snode->spacetype= SPACE_NODE;   
00103     
00104     /* backdrop */
00105     snode->zoom = 1.0f;
00106     
00107     /* header */
00108     ar= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "header for node");
00109     
00110     BLI_addtail(&snode->regionbase, ar);
00111     ar->regiontype= RGN_TYPE_HEADER;
00112     ar->alignment= RGN_ALIGN_BOTTOM;
00113     
00114     /* buttons/list view */
00115     ar= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "buttons for node");
00116     
00117     BLI_addtail(&snode->regionbase, ar);
00118     ar->regiontype= RGN_TYPE_UI;
00119     ar->alignment= RGN_ALIGN_RIGHT;
00120     ar->flag = RGN_FLAG_HIDDEN;
00121     
00122     /* main area */
00123     ar= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "main area for node");
00124     
00125     BLI_addtail(&snode->regionbase, ar);
00126     ar->regiontype= RGN_TYPE_WINDOW;
00127     
00128     ar->v2d.tot.xmin =  -256.0f;
00129     ar->v2d.tot.ymin =  -256.0f;
00130     ar->v2d.tot.xmax = 768.0f;
00131     ar->v2d.tot.ymax = 768.0f;
00132     
00133     ar->v2d.cur.xmin =  -256.0f;
00134     ar->v2d.cur.ymin =  -256.0f;
00135     ar->v2d.cur.xmax = 768.0f;
00136     ar->v2d.cur.ymax = 768.0f;
00137     
00138     ar->v2d.min[0]= 1.0f;
00139     ar->v2d.min[1]= 1.0f;
00140     
00141     ar->v2d.max[0]= 32000.0f;
00142     ar->v2d.max[1]= 32000.0f;
00143     
00144     ar->v2d.minzoom= 0.09f;
00145     ar->v2d.maxzoom= 2.31f;
00146     
00147     ar->v2d.scroll= (V2D_SCROLL_RIGHT|V2D_SCROLL_BOTTOM);
00148     ar->v2d.keepzoom= V2D_LIMITZOOM|V2D_KEEPASPECT;
00149     ar->v2d.keeptot= 0;
00150     
00151     return (SpaceLink *)snode;
00152 }

00167 static void node_area_listener(ScrArea *sa, wmNotifier *wmn)
00168 {
00169     /* note, ED_area_tag_refresh will re-execute compositor */
00170     SpaceNode *snode= sa->spacedata.first;
00171     int type= snode->treetype;
00172     short shader_type = snode->shaderfrom;
00173     
00174     /* preview renders */
00175     switch(wmn->category) {
00176         case NC_SCENE:
00177             switch (wmn->data) {
00178                 case ND_NODES:
00179                 case ND_FRAME:
00180                     ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00181                     break;
00182                 case ND_COMPO_RESULT:
00183                     ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00184                     break;
00185                 case ND_TRANSFORM_DONE:
00186                     if (type==NTREE_COMPOSIT) {
00187                         if (snode->flag & SNODE_AUTO_RENDER) {
00188                             snode->recalc= 1;
00189                             ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00190                         }
00191                     }
00192                     break;
00193             }
00194             break;
00195         case NC_WM:
00196             if (wmn->data==ND_FILEREAD)
00197                 ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00198             break;
00199         
00200         /* future: add ID checks? */
00201         case NC_MATERIAL:
00202             if (type==NTREE_SHADER) {
00203                 if (wmn->data==ND_SHADING)
00204                     ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00205                 else if (wmn->data==ND_SHADING_DRAW)
00206                     ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00207                 else if (wmn->action==NA_ADDED && snode->edittree)
00208                     nodeSetActiveID(snode->edittree, ID_MA, wmn->reference);
00209                     
00210             }
00211             break;
00212         case NC_TEXTURE:
00213             if (type==NTREE_SHADER || type==NTREE_TEXTURE) {
00214                 if (wmn->data==ND_NODES)
00215                     ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00216             }
00217             break;
00218         case NC_WORLD:
00219             if (type==NTREE_SHADER && shader_type==SNODE_SHADER_WORLD) {
00220                 ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);    
00221             }
00222             break;
00223         case NC_OBJECT:
00224             if (type==NTREE_SHADER) {
00225                 if (wmn->data==ND_OB_SHADING)
00226                     ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00227             }
00228             break;
00229         case NC_TEXT:
00230             /* pynodes */
00231             if (wmn->data==ND_SHADING)
00232                 ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00233             break;
00234         case NC_SPACE:
00235             if (wmn->data==ND_SPACE_NODE)
00236                 ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00237             else if (wmn->data==ND_SPACE_NODE_VIEW)
00238                 ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00239             break;
00240         case NC_NODE:
00241             if (wmn->action == NA_EDITED)
00242                 ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00243             else if (wmn->action == NA_SELECTED)
00244                 ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00245             break;
00246         case NC_SCREEN:
00247             switch(wmn->data) {
00248                 case ND_ANIMPLAY:
00249                     ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00250                     break;
00251             }
00252             break;
00253 
00254         case NC_IMAGE:
00255             if (wmn->action == NA_EDITED) {
00256                 if (type==NTREE_COMPOSIT) {
00257                     /* note that nodeUpdateID is already called by BKE_image_signal() on all
00258                      * scenes so really this is just to know if the images is used in the compo else
00259                      * painting on images could become very slow when the compositor is open. */
00260                     if (nodeUpdateID(snode->nodetree, wmn->reference))
00261                         ED_area_tag_refresh(sa);
00262                 }
00263             }
00264             break;
00265     }
00266 }
00267 
00268 static void node_area_refresh(const struct bContext *C, struct ScrArea *sa)
00269 {
00270     /* default now: refresh node is starting preview */
00271     SpaceNode *snode= sa->spacedata.first;
00272 
00273     snode_set_context(snode, CTX_data_scene(C));
00274     
00275     if (snode->nodetree) {
00276         if (snode->treetype==NTREE_SHADER) {
00277             if (GS(snode->id->name) == ID_MA) {
00278                 Material *ma= (Material *)snode->id;
00279                 if (ma->use_nodes)
00280                     ED_preview_shader_job(C, sa, snode->id, NULL, NULL, 100, 100, PR_NODE_RENDER);
00281             }
00282             else if (GS(snode->id->name) == ID_LA) {
00283                 Lamp *la= (Lamp *)snode->id;
00284                 if (la->use_nodes)
00285                     ED_preview_shader_job(C, sa, snode->id, NULL, NULL, 100, 100, PR_NODE_RENDER);
00286             }
00287             else if (GS(snode->id->name) == ID_WO) {
00288                 World *wo= (World *)snode->id;
00289                 if (wo->use_nodes)
00290                     ED_preview_shader_job(C, sa, snode->id, NULL, NULL, 100, 100, PR_NODE_RENDER);
00291             }
00292         }
00293         else if (snode->treetype==NTREE_COMPOSIT) {
00294             Scene *scene= (Scene *)snode->id;
00295             if (scene->use_nodes) {
00296                 /* recalc is set on 3d view changes for auto compo */
00297                 if (snode->recalc) {
00298                     snode->recalc= 0;
00299                     node_render_changed_exec((struct bContext*)C, NULL);
00300                 }
00301                 else 
00302                     snode_composite_job(C, sa);
00303             }
00304         }
00305         else if (snode->treetype==NTREE_TEXTURE) {
00306             Tex *tex= (Tex *)snode->id;
00307             if (tex->use_nodes) {
00308                 ED_preview_shader_job(C, sa, snode->id, NULL, NULL, 100, 100, PR_NODE_RENDER);
00309             }
00310         }
00311     }
00312 }
00313 
00314 static SpaceLink *node_duplicate(SpaceLink *sl)
00315 {
00316     SpaceNode *snoden= MEM_dupallocN(sl);
00317     
00318     /* clear or remove stuff from old */
00319     snoden->nodetree= NULL;
00320     snoden->linkdrag.first= snoden->linkdrag.last= NULL;
00321     
00322     return (SpaceLink *)snoden;
00323 }

00326 /* add handlers, stuff you only do once or on area/region changes */
00327 static void node_buttons_area_init(wmWindowManager *wm, ARegion *ar)
00328 {
00329     wmKeyMap *keymap;
00330 
00331     ED_region_panels_init(wm, ar);
00332     
00333     keymap = WM_keymap_find(wm->defaultconf, "Node Generic", SPACE_NODE, 0);
00334     WM_event_add_keymap_handler(&ar->handlers, keymap);
00335 }
00336 
00337 static void node_buttons_area_draw(const bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
00338 {
00339     ED_region_panels(C, ar, 1, NULL, -1);
00340 }

00342 /* Initialize main area, setting handlers. */
00343 static void node_main_area_init(wmWindowManager *wm, ARegion *ar)
00344 {
00345     wmKeyMap *keymap;
00346     ListBase *lb;
00347     
00348     UI_view2d_region_reinit(&ar->v2d, V2D_COMMONVIEW_CUSTOM, ar->winx, ar->winy);
00349     
00350     /* own keymaps */
00351     keymap = WM_keymap_find(wm->defaultconf, "Node Generic", SPACE_NODE, 0);
00352     WM_event_add_keymap_handler(&ar->handlers, keymap);
00353     
00354     keymap = WM_keymap_find(wm->defaultconf, "Node Editor", SPACE_NODE, 0);
00355     WM_event_add_keymap_handler_bb(&ar->handlers, keymap, &ar->v2d.mask, &ar->winrct);
00356     
00357     /* add drop boxes */
00358     lb = WM_dropboxmap_find("Node Editor", SPACE_NODE, RGN_TYPE_WINDOW);
00359     
00360     WM_event_add_dropbox_handler(&ar->handlers, lb);
00361 }

00363 static void node_main_area_draw(const bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
00364 {
00365     View2D *v2d= &ar->v2d;
00366     
00367     drawnodespace(C, ar, v2d);
00368 }

00371 /* ************* dropboxes ************* */
00372 
00373 static int node_drop_poll(bContext *UNUSED(C), wmDrag *drag, wmEvent *UNUSED(event))
00374 {
00375     if (drag->type==WM_DRAG_ID) {
00376         ID *id= (ID *)drag->poin;
00377         if ( GS(id->name)==ID_IM )
00378             return 1;
00379     }
00380     else if (drag->type==WM_DRAG_PATH) {
00381         if (ELEM(drag->icon, 0, ICON_FILE_IMAGE))   /* rule might not work? */
00382             return 1;
00383     }
00384     return 0;
00385 }
00386 
00387 static void node_id_path_drop_copy(wmDrag *drag, wmDropBox *drop)
00388 {
00389     ID *id= (ID *)drag->poin;
00390     
00391     if (id) {
00392         RNA_string_set(drop->ptr, "name", id->name+2);
00393     }
00394     if (drag->path[0]) {
00395         RNA_string_set(drop->ptr, "filepath", drag->path);
00396     }
00397 }

00399 /* this region dropbox definition */
00400 static void node_dropboxes(void)
00401 {
00402     ListBase *lb= WM_dropboxmap_find("Node Editor", SPACE_NODE, RGN_TYPE_WINDOW);
00403     
00404     WM_dropbox_add(lb, "NODE_OT_add_file", node_drop_poll, node_id_path_drop_copy);
00405     
00406 }

00417 static void node_header_area_draw(const bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
00418 {
00419     SpaceNode *snode= CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00420     Scene *scene= CTX_data_scene(C);
00421 
00422     /* find and set the context */
00423     snode_set_context(snode, scene);
00424 
00425     ED_region_header(C, ar);
00426 }

00428 /* used for header + main area */
00429 static void node_region_listener(ARegion *ar, wmNotifier *wmn)
00430 {
00431     /* context changes */
00432     switch(wmn->category) {
00433         case NC_SPACE:
00434             if (wmn->data==ND_SPACE_NODE)
00435                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00436             break;
00437         case NC_SCREEN:
00438             if (wmn->data == ND_GPENCIL)    
00439                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00440             break;
00441         case NC_SCENE:
00442         case NC_MATERIAL:
00443         case NC_TEXTURE:
00444         case NC_NODE:
00445             ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00446             break;
00447         case NC_OBJECT:
00448             if (wmn->data==ND_OB_SHADING)
00449                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00450             break;
00451         case NC_ID:
00452             if (wmn->action == NA_RENAME)
00453                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00454             break;
00455     }
00456 }
00457 
00458 const char *node_context_dir[] = {"selected_nodes", NULL};
00459 
00460 static int node_context(const bContext *C, const char *member, bContextDataResult *result)
00461 {
00462     SpaceNode *snode= CTX_wm_space_node(C);
00463     
00464     if (CTX_data_dir(member)) {
00465         CTX_data_dir_set(result, node_context_dir);
00466         return 1;
00467     }
00468     else if (CTX_data_equals(member, "selected_nodes")) {
00469         bNode *node;
00470         
00471         if (snode->edittree) {
00472             for (node=snode->edittree->nodes.last; node; node=node->prev) {
00473                 if (node->flag & NODE_SELECT) {
00474                     CTX_data_list_add(result, &snode->edittree->id, &RNA_Node, node);
00475                 }
00476             }
00477         }
00478         CTX_data_type_set(result, CTX_DATA_TYPE_COLLECTION);
00479         return 1;
00480     }
00481     else if (CTX_data_equals(member, "active_node")) {
00482         bNode *node;
00483         
00484         if (snode->edittree) {
00485             for (node=snode->edittree->nodes.last; node; node=node->prev) {
00486                 if (node->flag & NODE_ACTIVE) {
00487                     CTX_data_pointer_set(result, &snode->edittree->id, &RNA_Node, node);
00488                     break;
00489                 }
00490             }
00491         }
00492         CTX_data_type_set(result, CTX_DATA_TYPE_POINTER);
00493         return 1;
00494     }
00495     
00496     return 0;
00497 }
00498 
00499 /* only called once, from space/spacetypes.c */
00500 void ED_spacetype_node(void)
00501 {
00502     SpaceType *st= MEM_callocN(sizeof(SpaceType), "spacetype node");
00503     ARegionType *art;
00504     
00505     st->spaceid= SPACE_NODE;
00506     strncpy(st->name, "Node", BKE_ST_MAXNAME);
00507     
00508     st->new= node_new;
00509     st->free= node_free;
00510     st->init= node_init;
00511     st->duplicate= node_duplicate;
00512     st->operatortypes= node_operatortypes;
00513     st->keymap= node_keymap;
00514     st->listener= node_area_listener;
00515     st->refresh= node_area_refresh;
00516     st->context= node_context;
00517     st->dropboxes = node_dropboxes;
00518     
00519     /* regions: main window */
00520     art= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegionType), "spacetype node region");
00521     art->regionid = RGN_TYPE_WINDOW;
00522     art->init= node_main_area_init;
00523     art->draw= node_main_area_draw;
00524     art->listener= node_region_listener;
00525     art->keymapflag= ED_KEYMAP_UI|ED_KEYMAP_VIEW2D|ED_KEYMAP_FRAMES|ED_KEYMAP_GPENCIL;
00526 
00527     BLI_addhead(&st->regiontypes, art);
00528     
00529     /* regions: header */
00530     art= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegionType), "spacetype node region");
00531     art->regionid = RGN_TYPE_HEADER;
00532     art->prefsizey= HEADERY;
00533     art->keymapflag= ED_KEYMAP_UI|ED_KEYMAP_VIEW2D|ED_KEYMAP_FRAMES|ED_KEYMAP_HEADER;
00534     art->listener= node_region_listener;
00535     art->init= node_header_area_init;
00536     art->draw= node_header_area_draw;
00537     
00538     BLI_addhead(&st->regiontypes, art);
00539 
00540     node_menus_register();
00541     
00542     /* regions: listview/buttons */
00543     art= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegionType), "spacetype node region");
00544     art->regionid = RGN_TYPE_UI;
00545     art->prefsizex= 180; // XXX
00546     art->keymapflag= ED_KEYMAP_UI|ED_KEYMAP_FRAMES;
00547     art->listener= node_region_listener;
00548     art->init= node_buttons_area_init;
00549     art->draw= node_buttons_area_draw;
00550     BLI_addhead(&st->regiontypes, art);
00551     
00552     node_buttons_register(art);
00553     
00554     BKE_spacetype_register(st);
00555 }
